column3: Since September 11, security has been increased everywhere, and we have new IDs to get on to the Fox lot. I drove to the security gate, but realized I'd left my ID in my other car. I just broke into that voice - 'Hey, man, I'm Bart Simpson. Who else sounds like this?' The guard waved me through.

The days when a car aficionado could repair his or her own car are long past, due primarily to the high software content.
I don't have an interest in any car that isn't good for the environment, other than maybe an aesthetic quality in a picture book.

I was pulled out of my car for a minor traffic violation - an incident that escalated into my being thrown into cuffs and told I was going to jail. Except in my story, the hero doesn't get off as easily as I did.
